MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Castle Douglas and Dalbeattie. Our engineers have arrived on site at Craigton Farm to investigate reports of a grounded overhead line and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00p. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:30pm on Sunday, 18 October 2020
